sourcesContent:
import { unwrapResult } from '@reduxjs/toolkit' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { getProductId } from 'src/utils/helper' import { getProductDetail } from './productDetail.slice' import * as S from './productDetail.style' export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const { productId } = useParams() const id = getProductId(productId) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProductDetail(id)) .then(unwrapResult) .then(res => { setProduct(res.data) }) }, [dispatch, id]) return (
{product && (
{product.images.map((image, index) => ( ))} {product.name}
)}
) }
